testcase.name: testFindNonExistentBookById

error.message:
Mockito cannot mock this class: class library.repositories.BookRepository.
If you're not sure why you're getting this error, please open an issue on GitHub.
Java : 25 JVM vendor name : Oracle Corporation JVM vendor version : 25+37-LTS-3491 JVM name : Java HotSpot(TM) 64-Bit Server VM JVM version : 25+37-LTS-3491 JVM info : mixed mode, sharing OS name : Windows 11 OS version : 10.0
You are seeing this disclaimer because Mockito is configured to create inlined mocks. You can learn about inline mocks and their limitations under item #39 of the Mockito class javadoc.
Underlying exception : org.mockito.exceptions.base.MockitoException: Could not modify all classes [class java.lang.Object, class library.repositories.BookRepository]
